entry.title: $1950 // Very SPACIOUS Bright 1 Bedroom + Eat-in-Kitchen + Elevator
entry.content:
Very SPACIOUS Bright 1 Bedroom + Eat-in-Kitchen + Elevator

Listing ID #: 154938
Price: $1,950
Property Type: Apartment
Bedrooms: 1.0
Bathrooms: 1.0
Pets: Pets OK

Apartment Amenities

Eat In Kitchen
Hardwood
High Ceilings
Light
Renovated

BRAND NEW RENOVATIONS! RENT STABILIZED!!! INCREDIBLE SUNNY LARGE 1 Bedroom in Elevator building! The unit has a windowed Eat-in-kitchen and a very large living room. The bedroom fits a King size bed and more - to top it off there are 3 large closets! Pet friendly! Apartment features: -newly renovationed -king size bedroom -kitchen with dining area -bathroom with bathtub -hardwood floors -great closet space --> Plenty of natural light. Building is conveniently located near 30th Avenue where all the supermarkets, trains, restaurants and gyms are located.

Contact me via call, text or email to schedule a viewing!

Olga Breise

Phone: (646) 836-1673
Email: olga@bouklisgroup.com

The Bouklis Group
